application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Approval of Planning Condition 7 (Positions, Design, Materials and Type of all gates, Boundary Treatment, Fences and Means of Enclosures), 8 (Landscaping Scheme) and 10 (Cycle Facilities) of Planning Permission ref: 19/03124/FUL (Demolition of existing bungalow and erection of two storey dwelling with accommodation in roof space)
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 8 (Landscaping Scheme) of planning permission 19/03124/FUL. Therefore the proposal fails to demonstrate that the proposed development would be in the interests of the visual amenity and in accordance with Policy DM10 of the Core Strategy Adopted (2012).

Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 10 (Cycle Facilities) of planning permission 19/03124/FUL. As such the proposal fails to demonstrate an adequate and secure provision of cycling facilities, contrary to Policy DM10 of the Core Strategy Adopted (2012) and Policy 6.9 of the London Plan (2016).
